full_summary:
# Miscellaneous Parts for Depot Replenishment
## Solicitation Information
### **Solicitation Number**
W8486-238817/A
### **Publication Date**
2022-08-29
### **Tender Closing Date**
2022-10-07T14:00:00
### **Amendment Number**
1
### **Amendment Date**
2022-09-13

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for miscellaneous parts under the Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN) N2910 (Engine Fuel System Components, Non-Aircraft). The tender seeks to procure a total of 65 units of various fuel system components.

Details of the required items are as follows:

| **Item Number** | **Description** | **Quantity** | **Unit of Issue** | **Delivery Address** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | PUMP, FUEL, Electrical | 25 | EA | 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec |
| 2 | PUMP, FUEL, Electrical | 15 | EA | 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta |
| 3 | HEATER, COOLANT, ENGINE | 15 | EA | 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec |
| 4 | HEATER, COOLANT, ENGINE | 10 | EA | 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta |
| 5 | D4 HEATER KIT | 40 | EA | 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec |

## Submission Requirements
Bidders must submit their proposals electronically via email to the Contracting Authority. All documents may be presented in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Debriefings
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of the results of the bid solicitation process. The debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone or in person.

## Contact Information
For any further queries or to request a debriefing, please contact:

Richard Gagnon
richard.gagnon6@forces.gc.ca (Email)
613-294-6896 (Phone)
45 Blvd Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau QC, K0A 2K0
